# init(rawValue:)

**Initializer**

Returns the set of availability categories represented by the given value.

## Declaration

```swift
init(rawValue: UInt)
```

## Parameters

- **rawValue**: An unsigned integer expressing the union of the options for the set.

## Discussion

It’s unlikely that your code should call this directly. Instead, refer to the static members to create an [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/OptionSet] of [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INShortcutAvailabilityOptions].
